titleInfo.title: Report of the Secretary of War : in compliance with a resolution of the Senate of February 17, 1855, calling for a report and map of Colonel Fullers survey of Red River, in the region of the raft

mods.note: Caption title; At head of title: 33d Congress, 2d Session. Senate. Ex. doc. no. 62; February 24, 1855. Read, ordered to lie on the table and be printed.; Report is signed: Charles A. Fuller, United States agent and engineer; Map has caption: Map of Red River with its bayous and lakes in the vicinity of the raft. Drawn by Chas. A. Fuller, January 1855.

titleInfo.title: LSU Libraries Louisiana Waterways Management Collection
